You wake up with a start, scratching your head. Where are you? Before you can look, your gaze goes downward and you blush deeply; you're completely naked! You cover up your privates, looking around to try and find out where you are.

You are...
11.title: A boy!

info.brief_description: You wake up in a strange world where everyone and everything wants to tickle-torture you!
info.description:
In this story, you are a male (or female) who wakes up completely naked in a strange new world. In this world, all humans, plants, animals, and everything else alive has an undying obsession with tickle-torturing you as much as you can, wiling to do anything just to get to you!

Rules:
-you never get to wear any clothing
-you can never leave this world
-every living thing you meet does not care about what you want, wanting nothing more than to tickle-torture you on all your most ticklish spots.
